name: Turrim Inferos
description:
Turrim Inferos - Hell Tower

This game is about surviving while climbing the Hell Tower.

It is inspired by the arcarde game "tower of druaga" and was created for the Curious Game Jam 2020 Hosted by its_HarshArora.  The topic was "70s-90s Arcade Games".

Our Team consinsts off:

Dextex - Mike Hoffmann
speedlysp00ch - Dominik Lay
Nox - Dustin Leese
chilled_out_banana - Kaye
